title: Interactive Peer Assessment Competency Enhancement Workshop for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Holding a basic teaching license, experience with PBL (Project-Based Learning), and foundational understanding of peer assessment
context.additional_context: Customized workshops for current language education practitioners, utilizing real-time collaboration tools in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Participants can apply the three-stage interactive peer assessment framework (request-feedback-write-reflect) to project-based activities.
Participants can provide skill-improvement learning design feedback with over 80% accuracy using structured rubrics during peer assessments.
Participants can convert evaluation results into three or more practical improvement strategies using feedback acceptance analysis tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
